titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw, Lectionary for the entire year (fols. 3ra-91vb) I-1) Scriptural readings with Psalms for liturgical periods, fasts and feasts (for the entire year) (fols. 3ra-40rb; 59ra-91vb) - Liturgical period called Yoḥannәs: fols. 3ra-6ra - Feasts of the Minor Prophets (Näbiyat Ṣadәqan): fols. 6ra-8rb - Liturgical period Mäsqäl: fols. 8rb-11ra - Liturgical period Ṣәge: fols. 11ra-12va, 14ra-16vb - Liturgical period Sәbkät: fols. 12va-14ra - Liturgical period Lәdät: fols. 16vb-19rb - Feast of the Epiphany (Ṭәmqät): fols. 19rb-21ra - Feast of the Wedding of Cana (Qana zä-Gälila): fols. 21ra-22vb - Feasts of Mary (zä-ʾәgziʾtәnä): fols. 22vb-26rb - Feasts of the Martyrs (Sämaʿtat): fols. 26rb-28va - Feasts of the Righteous Ones (Ṣadәqan): fols. 28va-31vb - Fast of the Apostles (Ḥawaryat): fols. 31vb-36ra - Feats of Angels (Mälaʾәkt): fols. 36ra-40rb - Incarnation (Mäggäbit 29): fols. 59ra-60ra - Transfiguration (Däbrä Tabor): fols. 60ra-62va - 8th Sunday before Easter, Sunday of “He who descended…” (zä-wärädä…) or “of the Encounter with the Fast” (Qäbbäla ṣom): fols. 62va-65va - 7th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Holy” (Qәddәst): fols. 65va-67vb - 4th Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Mount of Olives” (Däbrä Zäyt): fols. 67vb-70va - 3rd Sunday before Easter, Sunday “of the Good Servant” (Gәbәr ḫer): fols. 70va-72vb - Palm Sunday (Hosaʿәna): fols. 72vb-76ra - Maundy Thursday (Ṣälotä Ḫamus): fols. 76ra-77vb - Resurrection (Tәnśaʾe): fols. 77vb-80va - Sunday after Easter (Fäṣṣämnä…): fols. 80va-82vb - Ascension (ʿƎrgät): fols. 82vb-86rb - Pentecost (Ṗaraqliṭos): fols. 86rb-88va - Liturgical period Kәrämt (“Rainy season”): fols. 88va-90ra - Blessing prayer (Bakәkännä ʾƎgziʾo… “Bless us, Lord…): fols. 90vb-91vb I-2) Scriptural readings for the days of the week (fols. 40rb-59ra) - Monday (sänuy): fols. 40rb-43vb - Tuesday (śälus): fols. 43vb-46ra - Wednesday (räbuʿ): fols. 46ra-48va - Thursday (ḥamus): fols. 48va-50rb - Friday (ʾarb): fols. 50rb-52ra - Saturday (qädamit sänbät): fols. 52ra-54vb - Sunday (ʾǝḥud): fols. 54vb-59ra
Additiones 1-2; colophon.

copyists.copyist: The name of an individual, Gäbrä Mädḫәn is mentioned, probably the scribe and one the donors (s. Additio 2)

donors.donor: Name of the scribe, Gäbrä Mädḫәn, is mentioned in the colophon and in supplication formulas throughout Text I (e.g., 11vb, 19rb, 24rb). Other names appear in the supplication formulas in Text I: Gäbrä Giyorgis (e.g. fols. 3ra, 6ra, 9ra), ʾAmätä Mikaʾel (fols. 4ra, 7ra, 11ra), Gäbrä ʾIyäsus (fols. 8va, 14vb, 20rb), Rämḫa Śәllase (fols. 14ra, 16vb, 21va), ʾAmätä Maryam (fols. 21ra, 26rb, 83rb), Wälättä Mikaʾel (fols. 27vb).

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with dark brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Overback made of reddish-brown leather. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the dark brown leather cover (at least 6 tools are used: straight triple line, straight double line, criss-cross, double circle, zig-zag, cross hatching). Blind tooled ornament on the reddish-brown leather overback (at least 4 tools are used: straight triple line, circle, straight triple line, cross hatching).

bnothers.bnother: Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover. Endbands are laced with a cord.

squires.squire: A(2/fols. 1r-2v) – I(8/fols. 3r-10v) – II(8/fols. 11r-18v) – III(8/fols. 19r-26v) – ፬IV(8/fols. 27r-34v) – ፭V(8/fols. 35r-42v) – ፮VI(8/fols. 43r-50v) – ፯VII(8/fols. 51r-58v) – ፰VIII(8/fols. 59r-66v) – ፱IX(8/fols. 67r-74v) – ፲X(8/fols. 75r-82v) – ፲፩XI(8/fols. 83r-90v) – XII(5; s.l. 2, stub after 4/fols. 91r-96v)

taunit.rl-info: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rulings.ruling: Pricking and ruling are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra; names of the donors in supplication formulas; incipit of Text II and its sections; titles of books and the first line of readings; directives to the ministers such as qәdmä wängel; abbreviation of the directive yәbәl ḥәzb, “the people say” in Text I; the word sälam in Text II; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numbers. On the incipit page of Texts I (fol. 3r) a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines). In fol. 62r, a few lines are rubricated (alternating with black lines).

otherdetails.otherdetail: - Text I is called Mäṣḥafä gәṣṣәw in the incipit (s. fol. 3ra) (cp. DMD-012). - Psalms are written in smaller script by hand a (e.g. fols. 18ra, 30va), except in fol. 4vb.

colophon.det: Written in the main hand. The name of the scribe and the donor (cp. supplication formulas, e.g. fols. 11vb, 19rb, 24rb) is Gäbrä Mädḫǝn.

additional.cont: Fol. 1v: Record concerning a reconciliation.
additional.det: The note is crudely written. The date 16 Ṭәqәmt 1930 (?) A.M. (= 26 October 1937 A.D.) is mentioned.

additional.cont: Fols. 92ra-96rb: Mälkәˀa Täklä Haymanot “Image of Täklä Haymanot”.

extras.extra: - Notes written in the upper margin: fols. 84rb, 90ra. - Crude notes written in pencil: fols. 2r, 95v. - Tämälläs-sign: fol. 84rb.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings of Text I are indicated by notes written in the upper margin: ዘዮሐንስ፡ fol. 3ra ዘነቢያት ጻድቃን: fol. 6ra ዘመስቀል፡ fol. 8rb ዘጽጌ፡ fol. 11ra ዘስብከት፡ fol. 12va ዘልደት፡ fol. 16vb ዘጥምቅት፡ fol. 19rb ዘቃና ዘገሊላ፡ fol. 21ra ዘእግዚእትና ማርያም፡ fol. 22vb ዘሰማዕትት፡ fol. 26rb ዘጻድቃን: fol. 28va ዘሐዋርያተ: fol. 31vb ዘመላእክት፡ fol. 36ra ዘሰኑይ፡ fol. 40rb ዘሣሉስ፡ fol. 43vb ዘረቡዕ፡ fol. 46ra ዘሐሙስ፡ fol. 48va ዘኣርብ፡ fol. 50rb ዘቀደሚት ሰንበት፡ fol. 52ra ዘእሁድ፡ fol. 54vb ኣመ፳ወ፱፡ ለመጋቢት፡ በዓለ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ጳውሎስ ግብረ፡ ሐዋርያት፡ ከልደት፡ አንብብ፤ ዘት[ስ]ብዕት፡ fol. 59ra ዘደብረ ታቦር፡ 60ra ዘቀበላ፡ fol. 62va እኁድ፡ ቅድስት፡ fol. 65va ዘደብረ፡ ዘይት፡ fol. 67vb ገብር፡ ኄር፡ fol. 70va ዘሆሣዕና፡ fol. 72vb ዘጸሎተ፡ ሐሙስ: fol. 76ra ዘትነሣኤ፡ fol. 77vb ዘፈጸምነ፡ fol. 80va ዘዕርገት፡ fol. 82vb ዘጳራቅሊጦስ: fol. 86rb ዘክረምት፡ fol. 88va ባርከነ፡ በል (directive for the ministers): fols. 90vb
